text: Well, we've finally arrived. The treasure vault is right in front of you, but don't think they'll just hand it over. This is your final test, Izzy.
Final test? So you've been testing my skills all this time?
Naturally. And know this - the results will directly affect your bonus. Show me what you've learned during this time.
A bonus... Alright, now I have an extra incentive not to screw up. I'll show you everything I can do!
Now that's the attitude! Remind me to raise your salary if you survive.
